channel.title: Newbie Updater
channel.description:
A few words before you download this: I did not make this updater to be a speed whore, i made it for simplicity and stability. It only has 3 hooks because frankly i can't work with it right now (Bad hangover). Might be able to write a few hooks tomorrow and update it. Unlike most other public updaters this loads the classes from a folder, so you can try your hooks on different rs client builds.
Updater (Including IntelliJ IDEA Project): http://www.speljohan.net/downloads/openSourceBot.rar
RS Builds (461, 462, 462v2, 463 and 468): http://www.speljohan.net/downloads/rsbuilds.rar
Hopefully someone will find this useful and maybe learn a few things. The more cheaters the better
That's about it, enjoy!

item.title: Newbie Updater
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

It be not broke. Epic Fale pls. Obviously it’s not completed to the level where you can practically use it, but it’s good for writing stable hooks since it never injects anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Newbie Updater
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

As much as I hate the usage of Field.getType() in place of Field.getSignature(), quite pretty to the eyes.[quote=“pplsuqbawlz, post:2, topic:131985”]Is broke.[/quote]Hrm, how would that have happened? Two extremely simple hooks, yet they’re already broken? Might want to fix that Speljohan.

Read full topic
